snippet: Kidd was named the Eastern Conference coach of the month for the second time this year, providing another indicator of how complete the Nets’ turnaround has been this season.
lead_paragraph: Kidd was named the Eastern Conference coach of the month for the second time this year, providing another indicator of how complete the Nets’ turnaround has been this season.

headline.main: Nets’ Surge Earns Jason Kidd a Second Award
headline.print_headline: Nets’ Surge Earns Kidd A Second Award
